definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: They're all Beta vulgaris, the way black Labradors and golden retrievers are all dogs.
sentences.chinese: 都是甜菜属，就像黑拉布拉多犬和金毛都属狗类。

sentences.english: The Tiandan303 is a genetic monogerm polyploid sugar beet hybrid.
sentences.chinese: 甜单303是甜菜遗传单粒型多倍体杂交种。

sentences.english: When sugar beet growers switched to the new varieties two years ago, they did not expect legal problems.
sentences.chinese: 两年前，甜菜农们换用新品种时并没想到有法律问题。

sentences.english: Now we are going to unload the beet pulp pellet overside into the barges.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们要把外档的甜菜渣卸到驳船上。

sentences.english: Ultimately, the beets were allowed to stay in the ground, however.
sentences.chinese: 然而最终，甜菜还是被允许留在它们的土地上。

sentences.english: USDA agency ruled on the most popular variety of Roundup Ready sugar beets.
sentences.chinese: 美国农业部相关部门对最常见的抗农达甜菜做出裁决。

sentences.english: Beets need the acidity level in the soil to be six to seven and a half.
sentences.chinese: 甜菜需要在土壤中的酸度水平的六至七个半。

sentences.english: It also has betaine to support normal liver function and cardiovascular health.
sentences.chinese: 它还拥有支持甜菜碱肝功能正常和心血管健康。

sentences.english: Corn and sugar beets could be the future.
sentences.chinese: 玉米和糖用甜菜可能是未来的出路。

sentences.english: The paper studied the covered material thickness of the frozen sugarbeet storage.
sentences.chinese: 本文对甜菜冻藏长期保管的苫盖厚度做一可行性研究。

sentences.english: We have talked about growing carrots and beets.
sentences.chinese: 之前，我们已谈过种植胡萝卜和甜菜的话题。

sentences.english: This indicates that the examination of sugar' content in elite mother beets is not neccessary.
sentences.chinese: 由此说明甜菜原种母根免于检糖是可行的。

sentences.english: Roast some fresh beets for an eye-saving side dish.
sentences.chinese: 把烘甜菜根作为眼睛治疗食物。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to red beet cola and its preparation process.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及红甜菜可乐及其制备方法。

sentences.english: I enjoy beetroot and kale smoothies with a dash of turmeric and ground pepper.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢甜菜根和甘蓝奶昔，外加少许姜黄和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: The effects of Fengtian liquid fertilizer on sucrose-metabolizing enzymes in sugarbeet were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了丰田液体肥对甜菜蔗糖代谢关键酶活性的影响。

definition: oilseed rape (Brassica napus)/flowering edible rape (Brassica chinensis var. oleifera)
